dict.acceptation: 主管，主任；董事，理事；负责人，监督者；导演；

sent.orig: In fact, both Macromedia Flash and Director follow basic object-oriented models in their own implementation.
sent.trans: 事实上，MacromediaFlash和Director在他们自己的实施中都遵循基本的面向对象的模型。

sent.orig: Director uses a slightly more typical approach.
sent.trans: Director使用一些稍微典型的方式。

sent.orig: In Director, the template is present in the form of a dedicated parent script.
sent.trans: 在Director中，模板是一个专用父脚本的形式表现。

sent.orig: There is also Director and Shockware that produce even better multimedia effects.
sent.trans: 利用Director和Shockware能产生更佳的多媒体效果。

sent.orig: Su-hong, deputy director of Hematology, deputy chief physician, Master, provincial executive director of experimental hematology.
sent.trans: 苏国宏血液内科副主任，副主任医师，硕士，省实验血液学会常务理事。
